title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
The Market capitalization in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
There is a difference of 37282.07 between the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in million euros for 10 number of Company Names.
The Market capitalization in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
The second highest Market capitalization in million euros is appeared to be the Company Name UniCredit.
Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio has 49.94 times less Market capitalization in million euros than Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo which is the highest.
The Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros, followed by UniCredit, and Mediobanca. Down to the Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio which is the lowest.
The Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo tends to be 4.28 percent higher than average.
